p: The main components of Santalum album oil are α- and β-santalol, which constitute 57–89% of total content [ 7]. These were found to be present in oil P6, described by the manufacturer as “natural essential sandalwood oil from India”. In this product, α-santalol constituted 37.1% of total content, β-santalol 22.0% ( Table 2 and Table 3), and 78.3% sesquiterpene alcohols ( Table 1).
